metadata.Title: CVE-2023-24626 on Ubuntu 22.10 (kinetic) - low.
metadata.Description: socket.c in GNU Screen through 4.9.0, when installed setuid or setgid (the default on platforms such as Arch Linux and FreeBSD), allows local users to send a privileged SIGHUP signal to any PID, causing a denial of service or disruption of the target process.

notes.Note: rodrigo-zaiden> debian does not use setuid or setgid for screen by default

criterions.comment: screen package in kinetic is affected and may need fixing.
